typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ClassID as string,
		Start as timestamp 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss',
		Finish as timestamp 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss',
		Teacher as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> classdata
